Artistic Residencies and Exhibitions page

  • Nov 12, 2020

    Catinca Malaimare - Artist Residency Program 2020

    Catinca Malaimare brings her performative practice to Agorama's artist residency program
  • Aug 17, 2020

    Shinji Toya - Paint Your Face Away

    Over the summer Alejandro lent a hand to help develop Shinji Toya latest interactive art project, Paint Your Face Away.
  • Aug 4, 2020

    Christopher Macinnes - Artist Residency Program 2020

    We are very pleased to announce Christopher Macinnes as the first artist to take part in our (online) residency program for 2020!
  • Dec 10, 2019

    Residency Reflections: Tamara Kametani

    Agorama's residency reflection focusing on Tamara Kametani's commission. Swayze Effect. By Alejandro Ball.
  • Dec 9, 2019

    Residency Reflections: Hazel Brill

    Agorama's residency reflection focusing on Hazel Brill's commission. Swayze Effect. By Max Dovey.
  • Feb 15, 2019

    Rebecca's Flat

    Our Flat in the old East End...
  • Jan 30, 2019

    Upcoming Residency Programme!

    Agorama is a collective of creative practitioners who engage with three main threads of activities. The first, Server Co-op intends to establish a peer-to-peer distributed platform for artist experimentation and to use this network infrastructure to develop a grass-roots autonomous model for digital communication.
